input_email_body:
Subject: Data Encryption Failure Issue

Dear customer support, we encountered a data encryption failure that revealed patient records. This could be due to outdated software or human error You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. We have already restarted the servers and reviewed the firewall settings. My name is Sophia Rossi.
